widget.name: com.siri.budgetdemo:id/help_text
widget.value:
1. Home Budget Manager is an integration of Accounts , Bills and Budget.
2. Home Budget Manager help you to track your expenses, incomes, bills and always stay with-in budget.
3. Shows Incomes and Expenses made month wise, Reminds you about pending bills, Shows Budget Set,Expenses made and Remaining budget in Month wise.
4. The app also gives you a graphical overview of the expenses, incomes and budget.
5. Menu Screen designed in way to do you things in most easy way. It mainly contains 12 Sections.

widget.name: com.siri.budgetdemo:id/help_text
widget.value:
12.1 Settings
Home-> Settings
a) Change Currency
b) Home Screen Theme
c) Bills Reminder (Set Time and Days before notification should be send and Don't forget to check Enable Button)
d) Set Default Date Range( Reflect in Transactions date range )
e) Database ( Restore and Backup Database)
f) Lock Application ( Enable/Disable Protection)

widget.name: com.siri.budgetdemo:id/help_text
widget.value:
1. Home Budget Manager is an integration of Accounts , Bills and Budget.
2. Home Budget Manager help you to track your expenses, incomes, bills and always stay with-in budget.
3. Shows Incomes and Expenses made month wise, Reminds you about pending bills, Shows Budget Set,Expenses made and Remaining budget in Month wise.
4. The app also gives you a graphical overview of the expenses, incomes and budget.
5. Menu Screen designed in way to do you things in most easy way. It mainly contains 12 Sections.

widget.name: com.siri.budgetdemo:id/help_text
widget.value:
1.Accounts: Add/Edit/Delete account.
2.Incomes: Add/Edit/Delete One time or Recurrent Incomes.
3.Expenses: Add/Edit/Delete One time or Recurrent Expenses.
4.Bills: Add/Edit/Delete One time or Recurrent Bill.
5.Budget: Add/Edit/Delete Budget.
6.Adding: Add Account Transfer/Income/Expense/Bill.
7.Categories: Add/Edit/Delete Category.
8.Re-currents: Shows all re-currents(i.e Recurrent Incomes/Expenses/Bills).
9.Summary: Gives quick summary of Incomes and Expenses(Note: Considers all accounts).
10.Upcoming Bills: Gives quick summary of upcoming bills(Note: Overdue and Next 30 days bills).
11.Reports: Helps to trace your cash-flow.
12.Settings: Change Currency, Home Screen Themes, Default Date Range, Bill Reminder, Password Protection, Database.
